Class.name: Scan.GetEmployeeInfo.TreatAsInternal
Class.Description: Decides if an external email should be treated as internal. If so, sets context.IsExternal=0 and returns 0; otherwise, returns the existing IsExternal value. It returns a value to response.IsExternal.

XData.name: RuleDefinition
XData.Data: <ruleDefinition alias="" context="Scan.GetEmployeeInfo.Context" production=""> <ruleSet name="" effectiveBegin="" effectiveEnd=""> <rule name="" disabled="false"> <when condition="(ToAddress="SamSmooth@MIU.com")||(ToAddress="PaulaPromotions@MIU.com")"> <assign property="IsExternal" value="0"></assign> <return>IsExternal</return> </when> </rule> <return>IsExternal</return> </ruleSet> </ruleDefinition>
